title: Laser-Cut Bracket Cell
highlights: Complete APQP coverage with quantified tolerances and takt time (42 sec).
Risks tied to mitigation owners with due dates within 2 weeks of pilot run.
Meeting decisions captured as TODOs with Asana task IDs.
fix_templates: Clarify UNKNOWN statements by referencing drawing rev data.
